MATH_MAT_E_001.subject: Mathematics
MATH_MAT_E_001.question_text: Find the value of the determinant |2  3|\n                                  |4  5|
MATH_MAT_E_001.question_text_html:
Find the value of the determinant
|2 3|
|4 5|

solution_steps.explanation: Product of main diagonal minus product of other diagonal

metadata.hint: Main diagonal product - other diagonal product

MATH_MAT_E_002.subject: Mathematics
MATH_MAT_E_002.question_text:
If A = [1  2] and B = [3  4], find element at (1,2) in A+B.
        [5  6]       [7  8]

        [0  1]       [3]

MATH_MAT_E_007.question_text: Which of the following is a diagonal matrix?

solution_steps.explanation: Diagonal matrix has all non-diagonal elements = 0

metadata.hint: Only diagonal elements can be non-zero

solution_steps.description: Find the one that's unique or most fundamental

MATH_MAT_MH_013.subject: Mathematics
MATH_MAT_MH_013.question_text: If A is a 3×3 matrix and A² = I, which of the following MUST be true?

solution_steps.explanation: This means A is an involutory matrix
